gen:link.msg:message: FATAL ERROR: In table [680-41] S1509 should be equal to S1501+S1502+S1503+S1504+S1505+S1506+S1507+S1508 with margin of error [1] {{abs([680-41:R15C9|RPC=Reporting period] ({$a}) - [680-41:R15C1|RPC=Reporting period] ({$b}) + [680-41:R15C2|RPC=Reporting period] ({$c}) + [680-41:R15C3|RPC=Reporting period] ({$d}) + [680-41:R15C4|RPC=Reporting period] ({$e}) + [680-41:R15C5|RPC=Reporting period] ({$f}) + [680-41:R15C6|RPC=Reporting period] ({$g}) + [680-41:R15C7|RPC=Reporting period] ({$h}) + [680-41:R15C8|RPC=Reporting period] ({$i})) <= 1}}
